thread.title: Queen’s Nazi salute: Buckingham Palace may have released film of Queen giving a Nazi salute |
thread.title_full: Queen’s Nazi salute: Buckingham Palace may have released film of Queen giving a Nazi salute | The Advertiser

author: AAP
title: Queen’s Nazi salute: Buckingham Palace may have released film of Queen giving a Nazi salute |
text:
FOOTAGE showing the Queen performing a Nazi salute as a child could have been accidentally leaked by Buckingham Palace, a British newspaper says.
The edited clip shows the young princess, aged six or seven, join the Queen Mother and her uncle Prince Edward in raising an arm in salute.
The Palace has expressed its disappointment that the film was obtained by The Sun newspaper, and has launched an inquiry into the leak.
A row of newspapers on display including a paper with a photo of Queen Elizabeth as a child giving a Nazi salute. Pic: AP Photo/Tim Ireland Source: AP
But Britain’s The Daily Telegraph says the footage may have been inadvertently released to a documentary maker, after a flurry of requests for the unseen royal home movies.
A spokesman for Buckingham Palace said: “There is an inquiry going on to find the source of the footage and until that inquiry is completed we would not give out any further information.” The Palace is considering taking legal action over the footage, which was taken in 1933.
Originally published as Who leaked the Queen’s Nazi salute?
